data.title: Tooltips leaking information.
data.body:

data.title: Palette error on orca bomb water (splash) effect
data.body: on TEMPERAT tileset.

data.title: Palette error on squished infantry effect
Fix missile - ground collision checking
Fix napuls sequences
data.body: Followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8799.

data.title: Lazily initialize cell projection mapping.
data.body:
This defers the creation of the cell <-> projected cell mapping until it is first needed.
It was previously calculated from PostInit, which is run on all maps while they are being loaded into the MapCache.  This is a really bad idea for two reasons:
1.  It eats a bunch of perf for no benefit.
2.  It forces the evaluation of the tileset, which forces evaluation of the map rules, which tries to load a bunch of assets (like the music) before the game has mounted the packages that contain them.

Fixes #8884.

data.title: LightingGlobal default of 1d.
data.body: Followup of #8865 per https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8865#discussion_r36044159.

data.title: Use background music for Fort Lonestar rain.
data.body: This improves the ambience (as the rain is not masked with music by default) and prevents a conflict with the game music if the player does choose to play something manually.  The volume of the rain effect is now also tied to the music volume.

data.title: Fixed Tiberian Sun mod not being versioned
data.body: and some related inconsistencies.

data.title: Sequence inheritance MiniYaml merging
data.body: Like we do for rules as proposed in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8799#issuecomment-126936258.

data.title: Decouple facing/orientation quantization from render traits
data.body:
This is necessary to allow an actor having multiple `With*Body` traits (for purposes like upgrading, deploying etc)., and therefore prerequisite for implementing deployable TS units (tick tank, sensor array, artillery etc) via `DeployToUpgrade`.

While not strictly a requirement, #8848 would make it a lot easier to implement this in a robust way.
Render traits don't necessarily require `IQuantizeBodyOrientation`, but in the presence of a trait that implements it they need to be loaded after that trait.

data.title: Revert "Improves filter text field in asset browser."
data.body:
This reverts commit 4fcf73921f07b8784c567f642d31e4e37c8fae95.
Fixes #8887.

data.title: Keyboard controls in the asset browser cannot be used anymore
data.body:
Introduced in #8680.

The change to the asset browser should probably be reverted. The keyboard controls are quite useful.

data.title: Fix queue commands for Plane/Heli
data.body: Feels a little bit like a poor man's solution because of the subclassing but it works. Fixes #6161.

data.title: Add multi palette support for tilesets.
data.body:
I request the ability to use custom pallets within each tileset, with something like this for example.

```
Templates:
    Template@0:
        Palette: isotem.pal

    Template@1:
        Palette: isosno.pal 
```

This would greatly expand the possibilities of custom terrain for 3rd party mods.

data.title: Music in Dune 2000 and Tiberian Sun is gone
data.body: It displays "No music installed" although the .aud and scores.mix are in place.

data.title: Remove ProximityCaptor from TS camera.
data.body: Removes some more rules uglyness that leaked from RA.

data.title: Fixed undefined white decoration radar colors
data.body: Fixes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/8855.

data.title: Fix Aircraft.GetActorBelow() altitude checking
data.body: `Map.DistanceAboveTerrain(WPos pos)` is called directly because `Aircraft` is an `IPositionable` trait and all calls to `Aircraft.GetActorBelow()` occur in `Tick` methods.

data.title: Fix radar pixel <-> cell conversions.
data.body: Fixes #8869.

data.title: TakeCover refactor
data.body:
`TakeCover` no longer inherits `Turreted`, and is now upgradable (so it can be enabled/disabled by upgrades).

I ditched `ProneOffset` because in my opinion, custom offsets should be done directly on the sequence definitions whenever possible.

data.title: Fix crate drop aircraft spawn height.
data.body: Fixes #8877.

data.title: Planes coming in from map edge start at higher altitude
data.body:
...than their cruise altitude.

Best seen on RA badgers with shroud/fog disabled.

data.title: Refine the music playlist code.
data.body:
This implements the plan from #8746 with some adaptations.
Also fixes a crash when opening the music player from the TD lobby, and randomizes the default starting song so that it doesn't always play the first song in music.yaml if shuffle is disabled.

data.title: Remove bounties from the TS mod.
data.body: As discussed in IRC.

data.title: Fixed RA grenadier prone-stand sequences
data.body: On bleed, RA grenadiers use the wrong frames for prone-stand(2).

data.title: Remove the balance-breaking unit duplication crate.
data.body: Closes #8058.

data.title: Water color cycle broken for RA ships on desert maps
data.body: The desert tileset modifies different palette indexes, so it doesn't animate on ships (and possibly sub pen/ship yard) on desert tileset.

data.title: Terrain Geometry Overlay does not respect heightmaps.
data.body: ![screen shot 2015-08-01 at 9 11 25 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4861023/9022119/773d8952-382d-11e5-9d39-c05bcec3520f.png)

data.title: Fix AI using SharedRandom values
data.body: The AI code runs on only one hosts, so by having the AI use SharedRandom values, the host's random gets out of sync with the other players' and crashes the game.
